title: Emerging Fates
description: Stephanie Rolsten is Maggie Henning's best friend. They've been together forever. They made plans for their future...But plans change. Futures change...When the car is found, a burned out husk, Stephanie refuses to believe her BFF is gone, taken from the world so soon. And Stephanie learns she isn't the only one who shares that belief.Hayden arrives as Stephanie is trying to say her goodbyes, a stranger who offers her hope. Together, they set out to discover what really happened to Stephanie's best friend that night after Maggie's visit to Sunnybrooke Psychiatric Hospital.But, who is this mysterious stranger Hayden? And what interest does he have in Stephanie's best friend? As Stephanie learns what has become of her dearest friend, can she also learn to accept what destiny has given her? And can Hayden, not part of Stephanie's world, grow to accept that what he is beginning to feel is more than just some sort of cruel joke on the part of Destiny?They shouldn't have met, their paths should never have crossed...or so logic would tell them both.Together, can the pair accept their Emerging Fates?
author: Lisa C. Morgan
